title: The Healer Who Wants To Be Healed - Novel Updates
tags: Doctors   Magic   Older Love Interests   R-18
author: 叶崎みお
description: Nikola, a magic manipulation surgeon who runs a treatment center in the city, is asked to treat a colleague of a childhood friend from the royal palace. It was Aldo, the  well sought out healer, who was brought here. Aldo has a surprising slump in the purification of the magic element, and Aldo is gradually attracted to Nikola who works hard to cure him….>
